entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or periods of ice pellets changing to a few flurries this morning and ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
